actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public lands in San Bernardino County, California to the Town of Red Mountain, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified public lands in San Bernadino County, California, to the town of Red Mountain, California, within two years of the receipt of the application of an association of the residents of such lands. Specifies the conditions under which such conveyance shall be made.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public lands in San Bernardino County, California to the Town of Red Mountain, and for other purposes.
